name: Stephen Vitiello
biography: In his varied works as a composer, electronic musician and sound artist, Stephen Vitiello has traversed many fields. He has exhibited his own installation work at galleries worldwide, and has collaborated with other artists in film, video, installation, interactive and performance based works. Among his collaborators are Jem Cohen, Tony Oursler, Nam June Paik, Pauline Oliveros, John Jasperse, Constance De Jong and Frnaces-Marie Uitti. He has also released several CD recordings of his music including 'The Light of Falling Cars' and 'Scratchy Marimba'. Stephen Vitiello lives and works in New York.
